origin.changelingorigin.changeling.name: Changeling
origin.changelingorigin.changeling.descr: Changelings are shapeshifters that can take on the form of creatures they kill.
power.changelingorigin.shape_on_kill.des: Killing a creature allows you to shape-shift into it.
power.changelingorigin.use_shape_ability: Some of your potential forms have special abilities that you can use.
